message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you, considering its worth to you is $100. Let me know if this works for you!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at $95. Considering my valuation of the product at $80, I would like to propose a price of $85. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I would like to propose an offer of $90 for the product. This allows us to meet somewhere in the middle while still ensuring a fair return for me. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
